name: ANVAN STORIES
description:
Dear Doctor,

With deep grief, I inform you of the sad demise of your uncle. As a direct relative, I shall acquaint you with his last testament will. Your deceased uncle decided to bequeath the whole of his goods to you. The inheritance consists of the family jewels, his collection of paintings, and what might interest you most, the castle where he lived.

From the moment you receive this letter, you have seven days to claim the inheritance in person. Otherwise, all the goods within his testament will be seized by the state.

Please receive a cordial greeting.

This project have been developed as an excersice in order to improve my Level Design skills. Please consider to leave a comment with your feedback on this page or contact me on Twitter @daviddiazgo . Thanks and enjoy!
